title: Hawaiian Electric's Rapid Response Restores Power in Downtown Honolulu | Headlines
text: Hawaiian Electric's Rapid Response Restores Power in Downtown Honolulu Hawaiian Electric has successfully completed all major repairs to restore power to customers in the Chinatown and downtown Honolulu areas that were affected by Mondayâ€™s outage. This swift action ensures that the community's electricity needs are promptly met and daily life can proceed without further disruptions. [Reuters](/reuters-stories)| Updated: 21-06-2024 08:10 IST | Created: 21-06-2024 08:10 IST HAWAIIAN ELECTRIC: * SAYS COMPLETES ALL MAJOR REPAIRS TO RESTORE CUSTOMERS IN THE CHINATOWN AND DOWNTOWN HONOLULU AREAS THAT WERE IMPACTED BY MONDAY'S OUTAGE RELATED: Hawaiian Electric working to restore power in downtown Honolulu (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.)
